record.id: field.name="istatus" and file.name="joinhandhelds" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: istatus
record.file.name: joinhandhelds

brief.brief: The status of the configuration item.

detail.detail: Installed: The configuration item is in place and operational.
Available: The configuration item can be used, but is not currently installed, for example, when the configuration item is stored in a stock room.
Warehouse: The configuration item is stored in a warehouse.
Transfer: The configuration item is being moved between locations.
RMA: The configuration item is being returned to the manufacturer or vendor for repairs or replacement.
Replaced: The configuration item has been replaced.
Reserved: The configuration item is reserved for future use.
Retired: The configuration item has been removed from service.
